subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Excuse Me....
author: Lisby
full_text:
I'm still wondering how this list went from a group of highly  
researchers all using Frank's boxes, mini's etc., and getting amazing  
results, so people who don't even think it's real and have never used  
one.

And it's Frank's original group on top of it all.

Sigh.

Ann

On Sep 14, 2008, at 8:49 PM, Stephen wrote:

> I believe I have recorded spirits, however I have never used  
> Frank's box
> so I cannot comment on it.
> I will record anywhere, anytime and I have recorded some excellent  
> results.
>
> Stephen ..
> http://evpresearch.redirectme.net
>
> maggotfurcoats wrote:
> >
> > But, are there any files on this group where any of you believe you
> > are communicating with a spirit? Frank's box seems to really force
> > all kinds of "voices" out of the airwaves and I am not yet buying  
> it.
> >
> > Does any one have anything constructive to say to us in regard to
> > actual paranormal investigation via Frank's box, rather than mildly
> > entertaining techno-tweaking?
> >
> > I was on a multi-group investigation at an old historical mission in
> > Santa Barbara a week ago, for instance and watched the frank's  
> box at
> > work for the first time.
> >
> > Sure, I heard a few things that sounded obviously like radio, but we
> > did hear a very eerie woman's voice screaming when we were in the  
> main
> > chapel room, and THAT got my attention.. But everything else I have
> > heard so far in the files here is not striking me as the voice of  
> any
> > apparition, due to the weakness of quality.
> >
> > If you're still reading this, I have to tell you I have had striking
> > results in my own home, simply letting a recording device roll,  
> and if
> > you're not yet interested in hearing these samples, I guess you're
> > more into the box than the afterlife and that's YOU, not me! :)
> >
> > LOVE,
> >
> > Katherine.
> >
> >
> >
